intro:
Stop the wild machinations
 of the Neo-Humanoids!
description:
-Story
The Year 2X45
The Neo-Humanoids, built as a warrior force, have rebelled.
Humans now fight their creations, but all it took was the blink of an eye for humans to reach a point of crisis.

In their 11th hour, a small hope for humanity was born.
This was when Commander Layla's special operations team, the SSS, was formed. 
The SSS specializes in infiltrating enemy strongholds and destroying them from the inside out.

However, the Neo-Humanoids responded by developing a new form of artificial soldiers, designed specifically to hunt humans.
Commander Layla, it's up to you stop the Neo-Humanoids and defend Earth!

-Features
Non-stop action in this trigger happy shooter!
Assorted difficulty adjustment settings
Almost (but not quite) 100 different weapons to acquire!

The "Pixel Game Maker Series" is a series of games created using the action game creation software "Pixel Game Maker MV" that can be enjoyed on the Nintendo Switch™.
